frontmatter.description: The COVID-19 pandemic caused a lot of disruption in education systems worldwide, leaving millions of students without access to quality education. As a product advisor at Era Interfaces, I was lucky enough to work with an amazing team of engineers, designers, and educators to develop EdTech solutions that could help underserved Indian college students studying engineering during the pandemic.
frontmatter.title: My Journey as a Product Advisor for Era Interfaces

frontmatter.description: Sanity testing plays a crucial role in verifying the functionality of new features before comprehensive testing. Recognizing the need for an efficient solution, I embarked on an exciting journey to build HAKIM, an innovative UI automation tool for Android.
frontmatter.title: Revolutionizing Sanity Testing with HAKIM
